INSERT INTO company_job_score_field (job_score_id, field_key, min_money, max_money, sort_no, remark) VALUES
(#{item.jobScoreId}, #{item.fieldKey}, #{item.minMoney}, #{item.maxMoney}, #{item.sortNo}, #{item.remark})
mapper.select: SELECT a.job_score_id jobScoreId, a.field_key fieldKey, b.name_cn nameCn, b.name_en nameEn, b.key, a.min_money minMoney, a.max_money maxMoney, a.sort_no sortNo, a.remark FROM company_job_score_field a LEFT JOIN wages_field_type b ON a.field_key = b.key AND b.state != 3 WHERE a.job_score_id = #{jobScoreId} ORDER BY a.sort_no ASC
